mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_subservicio_ssrv ssrv WHERE ssrv.ssrv_tpss_pk = portico.getEntidad('ATRAQUE') AND ssrv.ssrv_estado IN ('C') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_subservicio_ssrv ssrvAux WHERE ssrvAux.ssrv_srvc_pk = ssrv.ssrv_srvc_pk AND ssrvAux.ssrv_tpss_pk = ssrv.ssrv_tpss_pk AND ssrvAux.ssrv_numero < ssrv.ssrv_numero and ( ssrvAux.ssrv_ffin IS NULL OR ssrvAux.ssrv_estado NOT IN ('F', 'D', 'A') ) ) AND ssrv.ssrv_pk = #{value}
